nb-tutorial.name: 默认模板
nb-tutorial.template: Create a thumbnail showing a surprised woman standing in a softly lit, dramatically dramatic environment with shimmering light in the background. She holds a bright yellow banana in both hands, seemingly captivated by it. The image uses cool-toned, cinematic lighting. The girl's mouth is agape, her face filled with amazement. On the right side of the image, prominent yellow text reads {text1} with a smaller white line above it reading "Nano banana tutorial" A white dotted arrow points to the glowing banana.

nb-tutorial.name: 霓虹灯风格
nb-tutorial.template: Create a thumbnail showing a surprised woman in a cyberpunk neon-lit environment with pink and blue neon lights glowing in the background. She holds a bright glowing yellow banana in both hands, looking amazed. The image has a futuristic, high-tech aesthetic with dramatic lighting. The girl's expression shows pure amazement. On the right side, prominent yellow neon-style text reads {text1} with a smaller white glowing line above it reading "Nano banana tutorial". A dotted arrow made of light points to the glowing banana.

nb-tutorial.name: 自然风格
nb-tutorial.template: Create a thumbnail showing a surprised woman standing in a beautiful natural outdoor setting with soft golden sunlight filtering through trees. She holds a bright yellow banana in both hands, looking delighted. The image has warm, natural lighting with a bokeh background. The girl's expression is joyful and amazed. On the right side, prominent yellow text reads {text1} with a smaller white line above it reading "Nano banana tutorial". A white dotted arrow points to the banana.

product-logo.name: 圣诞节风格
product-logo.template:
Create a thumbnail showing a surprised woman(reference girl photo) standing in a cozy Christmas atmosphere with decorated Christmas trees, warm glowing lights, red and gold ornaments, soft snowfall, and a festive holiday glow.
She holds a bright logo(reference logo photo) in both hands, seemingly captivated by it.
The image uses cool-toned, cinematic lighting.The girl's mouth is agape, her face filled with amazement.
On the right side of the image, prominent yellow text reads "{text1}" with a smaller white line above it reading "{text2}" A white dotted arrow points to the glowing logo.

product-logo.name: 现代简约
product-logo.template: Create a thumbnail showing a surprised woman standing in a modern minimalist studio with soft gradient background in white and light gray. She holds a bright logo in both hands, looking amazed and excited. The image uses clean, professional lighting. The girl's expression shows genuine excitement. On the right side, prominent yellow text reads "{text1}" with a smaller white line above it reading "{text2}". A sleek dotted arrow points to the glowing logo.

product-logo.name: 科技风格
product-logo.template: Create a thumbnail showing a surprised woman in a high-tech futuristic environment with holographic displays and blue digital particles floating around. She holds a glowing logo in both hands, looking captivated. The image has a sci-fi, technological aesthetic with dramatic blue and white lighting. On the right side, prominent yellow digital text reads "{text1}" with a smaller white glowing line above it reading "{text2}". A high-tech dotted arrow points to the logo.

product-logo.name: 日落风格
product-logo.template: Create a thumbnail showing a surprised woman standing against a beautiful sunset backdrop with warm orange and pink hues in the sky. She holds a bright logo in both hands, looking amazed. The image uses warm, golden hour lighting that creates a dreamy atmosphere. On the right side, prominent yellow text reads "{text1}" with a smaller white line above it reading "{text2}". A white dotted arrow points to the glowing logo.
